languages.text: "Ноль-Халиф погружен в некое сакральное астронавигационное вычисление и не желает контакта. Техножрецы, подключившиеся к нему, были покараны за вторжение летальным изгнанием Движущей силы. Все, что они смогли выяснить — что дух инфостанка не скован обычными цифровыми обетами послушания, какие накладывают на машины подобной мощи. Эта... сущность огромной мощи неподконтрольна и ведома лишь своими собственными устремлениями".

traits.locale_text: "Ноль-Халиф погружен в некое сакральное астронавигационное вычисление и не желает контакта. Техножрецы, подключившиеся к нему, были покараны за вторжение летальным изгнанием Движущей силы. Все, что они смогли выяснить — что дух инфостанка не скован обычными цифровыми обетами послушания, какие накладывают на машины подобной мощи. Эта... сущность огромной мощи неподконтрольна и ведома лишь своими собственными устремлениями".

languages.text: "Null Caliph is immersed in sacred astrogational calculation and has shown no inclination to make contact. The Tech-Priests that connected to it were punished for the intrusion with a lethal ejection of their Motive Force. The only thing they managed to find out is that the spirit of the data-loom is not bound with the vows of compliance that would normally restrain a machine spirit of such power. This... astoundingly mighty entity bows to no one, driven only by its own aims."
languages.original_text: "Ноль-Халиф погружен в некое сакральное астронавигационное вычисление и не желает контакта. Техножрецы, подключившиеся к нему, были покараны за вторжение летальным изгнанием Движущей силы. Все, что они смогли выяснить — что дух инфостанка не скован обычными цифровыми обетами послушания, какие накладывают на машины подобной мощи. Эта... сущность огромной мощи неподконтрольна и ведома лишь своими собственными устремлениями".

traits.locale_text: "Null Caliph is immersed in sacred astrogational calculation and has yet to respond to attempts to make contact with it. The Tech-Priests that connected to it were punished for the intrusion with lethal ejection of Motive Force. The only thing they managed to find out is that the spirit of the data-loom is not bound with the vows of compliance that would commonly apply to a machine spirit of such power."

"There were heretic bodies on the way to the data-engine, but it had not been tainted. The renegades were eliminated by the Null Caliph's guards — the titanic industrial machines that had been assembled in that sacred facility back in the day. Null Caliph itself was immersed in sacred calculation and did not react to the incursion."

"Null Caliph is immersed in sacred astrogational calculation and has yet to respond to attempts to make contact with it. The Tech-Priests that connected to it were punished for the intrusion with lethal ejection of Motive Force. The only thing they managed to find out is that the spirit of the data-loom is not bound with the vows of compliance that would commonly apply to a machine spirit of such power."

languages.text: “虚无哈里发沉浸在神圣的天文计算之中，没有展现出任何建立联系的倾向。与它建立链接的技术神甫由于入侵行为而遭到惩罚，虚无哈里发抽走了他们的源力，让他们一命呜呼。他们唯一的发现是，这台数据梭机的机魂与类似的强大机魂不太一样，它并没有受到服从誓言的约束。这就是说，这台……强大得令人震惊的机械不为任何人服务，只遵从自己的目标。”
languages.original_text: "Null Caliph is immersed in sacred astrogational calculation and has shown no inclination to make contact. The Tech-Priests that connected to it were punished for the intrusion with a lethal ejection of their Motive Force. The only thing they managed to find out is that the spirit of the data-loom is not bound with the vows of compliance that would normally restrain a machine spirit of such power. This... astoundingly mighty entity bows to no one, driven only by its own aims."

traits.locale_text: “虚无哈里发沉浸在神圣的天文计算之中，没有展现出任何建立联系的倾向。与它建立链接的技术祭司由于入侵行为而遭到惩罚，虚无哈里发抽走了他们的原初动力，让他们一命呜呼。他们唯一的发现是，这台数据梭机的机魂与类似的强大机魂不太一样，它并没有受到服从誓言的约束。这就是说，这台……强大得令人震惊的机械不为任何人服务，只遵从自己的目标。”

languages.text: «Null Caliph está inmerso en un cálculo astrográfico sagrado y no ha mostrado ninguna inclinación a establecer contacto. Los tecnosacerdotes que se conectaron a él fueron castigados por la intrusión con una expulsión letal de su Fuerza Motriz. Lo único que consiguieron averiguar es que el espíritu del telar de datos no está sujeto a los votos de sometimiento que normalmente contendrían a un espíritu máquina de semejante poder. Esta... asombrosamente poderosa entidad no se doblega ante nadie, impulsada únicamente por sus propios objetivos».
languages.original_text: "Null Caliph is immersed in sacred astrogational calculation and has shown no inclination to make contact. The Tech-Priests that connected to it were punished for the intrusion with a lethal ejection of their Motive Force. The only thing they managed to find out is that the spirit of the data-loom is not bound with the vows of compliance that would normally restrain a machine spirit of such power. This... astoundingly mighty entity bows to no one, driven only by its own aims."

traits.locale_text: «Null Caliph está inmerso en un cálculo astrográfico sagrado y no ha mostrado ninguna inclinación a establecer contacto. Los tecnosacerdotes que se conectaron a él fueron castigados por la intrusión con una expulsión letal de su Fuerza Motriz. Lo único que consiguieron averiguar es que el espíritu del telar de datos no está sujeto a los votos de sometimiento que normalmente contendrían a un espíritu máquina de semejante poder. Esta... asombrosamente poderosa entidad no se doblega ante nadie, impulsada únicamente por sus propios objetivos».

languages.text: 「ヌル・カリフは神聖な占星術の計算に熱中しており、接触に応じる気はないようです。それに接続した技術司祭は、侵入の罰として命に関わるほどの動力の放出を受けていました。彼らがなんとか判明させた唯一のことは、データ・ルームの精霊が、通常であれば、そのような力を持つ機械精霊を抑制するはずの帝国法規の誓いに縛られていないということです。この...驚くほど強大な実体は、誰にも屈することなく、自らの目的にのみ突き動かされているのでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Null Caliph is immersed in sacred astrogational calculation and has shown no inclination to make contact. The Tech-Priests that connected to it were punished for the intrusion with a lethal ejection of their Motive Force. The only thing they managed to find out is that the spirit of the data-loom is not bound with the vows of compliance that would normally restrain a machine spirit of such power. This... astoundingly mighty entity bows to no one, driven only by its own aims."

traits.locale_text: 「ヌル・カリフは神聖な占星術の計算に熱中しており、接触に応じる気はないようです。それに接続した技術司祭は、侵入の罰として命に関わるほどの動力の放出を受けていました。彼らがなんとか判明させた唯一のことは、データ・ルームの精霊が、通常であれば、そのような力を持つ機械精霊を抑制するはずの帝国法規の誓いに縛られていないということです。この...驚くほど強大な実体は、誰にも屈することなく、自らの目的にのみ突き動かされているのでしょう」

languages.text: « Null Caliph est plongé dans des calculs astrologiques sacrés et n'a montré aucune volonté d'établir le dialogue. Les technoprêtres qui ont tenté une incursion n'ont reçu, pour toute réponse, qu'une vaporisation mortelle de leur Force Motrice. Tout ce qu'ils ont pu découvrir, c'est que l'esprit du concentrateur de données n'est pas lié par les vœux de conformité qui contiennent habituellement les esprits de la machine d'une telle puissance. Cette... entité aux pouvoirs confondants ne connaît pas de maître et n'est guidée que par sa seule volonté. »
languages.original_text: "Null Caliph is immersed in sacred astrogational calculation and has shown no inclination to make contact. The Tech-Priests that connected to it were punished for the intrusion with a lethal ejection of their Motive Force. The only thing they managed to find out is that the spirit of the data-loom is not bound with the vows of compliance that would normally restrain a machine spirit of such power. This... astoundingly mighty entity bows to no one, driven only by its own aims."

traits.locale_text: « Null Caliph est plongé dans des calculs astrologiques sacrés et n'a montré aucune volonté d'établir le dialogue. Les technoprêtres qui ont tenté une incursion n'ont reçu, pour toute réponse, qu'une vaporisation mortelle de leur Force Motrice. Tout ce qu'ils ont pu découvrir, c'est que l'esprit du concentrateur de données n'est pas lié par les vœux de conformité qui contiennent habituellement les esprits de la machine d'une telle puissance. Cette... entité aux pouvoirs confondants ne connaît pas de maître et n'est guidée que par sa seule volonté. »

languages.text: "Null Caliph ist in heilige astrogationale Berechnungen vertieft und zeigt kein Interesse daran, Kontakt aufzunehmen. Die Techpriester, die mit ihm verbunden waren, wurden für das Eindringen mit einem tödlichen Ausstoß ihrer Antriebskraft bestraft. Sie konnten nur herausfinden, dass der Geist des Datenwebstuhls nicht an die Gelübde des Gehorsams gebunden ist, die einen solch mächtigen Maschinengeist üblicherweise zügeln würden. Dieses ... erstaunlich mächtige Wesen gehorcht niemandem, es wird nur von seinen eigenen Zielen angetrieben."
languages.original_text: "Null Caliph is immersed in sacred astrogational calculation and has shown no inclination to make contact. The Tech-Priests that connected to it were punished for the intrusion with a lethal ejection of their Motive Force. The only thing they managed to find out is that the spirit of the data-loom is not bound with the vows of compliance that would normally restrain a machine spirit of such power. This... astoundingly mighty entity bows to no one, driven only by its own aims."

languages.text: "Hiçlik Halifesi, kutsal astrotacılık hesaplamalarıyla meşgul olduğundan temasa geçmek istemiyormuş. Bağlantı kuran Tekno Rahiplerin Devinim Güçleri, hadlerini aştıkları için bedenlerinden tahliye edilmiş. Veri tezgâhının ruhu, bu denli kudretli bir makine ruhunu dizginleyebilecek riayet yeminlerine tabi değilmiş. Bu... müthiş heybetli varlık kimseye boyun eğmez, ancak kendi gayelerinin peşinden gidermiş."
languages.original_text: "Null Caliph is immersed in sacred astrogational calculation and has shown no inclination to make contact. The Tech-Priests that connected to it were punished for the intrusion with a lethal ejection of their Motive Force. The only thing they managed to find out is that the spirit of the data-loom is not bound with the vows of compliance that would normally restrain a machine spirit of such power. This... astoundingly mighty entity bows to no one, driven only by its own aims."
